about.title: What is Projektname?
about.description: Projektname is a digital tool that helps small, volunteer-run clubs present themselves professionally online – no prior knowledge required.
about.background: The project was developed during the summer semester of 2025 as part of a study module at the Brandenburg University of Applied Sciences. The idea was based on an analysis of real club websites in the Brandenburg region and developed with a user-centered approach.
about.idea: Many clubs in Germany operate almost entirely on a volunteer basis. Time, money, and technical know-how are often limited – especially when it comes to website or social media content. As a result, valuable club work often goes unnoticed – even though it plays a central role in social, cultural, and community life. Projektname addresses this challenge by helping clubs quickly and easily create consistent content for multiple channels – whether it’s a new event post or an infographic about their work.
about.features: The tool offers: a custom club style guide (colors, logos, fonts), reusable templates for posts, centralized text and image management, and export options for various formats – directly in the browser.
about.disclaimer: This project is a scientific prototype. It is currently in development and being evaluated as part of this context. The platform is continuously evolving – feedback is welcome!

body.headline: Set up your Style Guide
body.text: Each club has its own style guide. You can customize it on your club page to match your club’s look. Choose and adjust fields like colors, backgrounds, fonts, and graphics. The style guide will automatically apply to all content to maintain a consistent appearance.

body.headline: Create Content
body.text: To create content, choose from a selection of templates. Then fill in the content using an editor, and adjust the design as needed.

body.headline: Manage Content
body.text: Content can be managed in a list. You can create alternate formats or duplicate a template.

body.headline: Register Your Club
body.text: To register your club, please go to the /join page to learn more.

join.title: Want to join?
join.description: Test the tool with your club – free, non-binding, and no prior knowledge required.
join.explenation: As this is a scientific prototype, access is currently not public. A first test phase will launch in summer 2025 (August–September). If your club is interested in trying it out and providing feedback, I’d be happy to set up a test account for you.
join.closing: I look forward to shaping this project together with you.
